LanguageData.Axi_SR_RPR_21CA.label: Ruger Precision Rifle
LanguageData.Axi_SR_RPR_21CA.description: Ruger's Precision Rifle platform is an interesting take on the modern precision rifle. Making extensive use of lightweight materials, and eschewing the typical characteristics of the traditional bolt-action rifle in favor of features like accessory rails and a fully-adjustable, skeletonized stock, Ruger has managed to produce a bolt gun that puts many competing (and oftentimes more expensive) products to shame.
